title: Why some post need level 6 to reply, but some post need 7?
body:
Dear Riot team,

just my curious, why the requirement is not the same for this 2 posts?



This one need level 6.
[first](http://i75.photobucket.com/albums/i306/bodinmon/board_01_zpspayegdpt.png)

This one need 7.
[second](http://i75.photobucket.com/albums/i306/bodinmon/board_02_zps900ksoii.png)

Thanks in advance & Regards

replies.body:
Different sub-boards have set their comment level requirement differently. Here on Help & Support there is no level requirement, but other boards have bigger issues with spam and have set their to specific levels to mitigate that spam.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Dear Targons,
noted. thank you very much for your reply!
